name: Among us the racing game
description:
Disclaimer: I'm not associated with Innersloth. Their art assets for the Skeld, the Among Us logo and the victory screen belong to them and are in no way owned by me.

This is a fun little project I wanted to do!! All in all, this took me about an hour to make, so I hope you enjoy!! There's also a video in the right bar where I document the making of this game!

Also, you need to vent from security to medbay to progress
